Modul model
Package de.kaiser.model.style

Klasse InlineElementStyleProperties

java.lang.Object
de.kaiser.model.style.ElementStyleProperties
de.kaiser.model.style.InlineElementStyleProperties
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
InlineTextElementStyleProperties
public class InlineElementStyleProperties extends ElementStyleProperties
A class representing style properties for inline elements. Extends ElementStyleProperties. This class provides properties specific to inline elements like background color.

    • copy

      public ElementStyleProperties copy()
      Beschreibung aus Klasse kopiert: ElementStyleProperties
      Creates a deep copy of this style properties object. This is crucial to prevent style modifications on one element from affecting another.
      Angegeben von:
      copy in Klasse ElementStyleProperties
      Gibt zurück:
      A new instance with the same property values as this object.
